name: RoastMe-Pro
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roast me pro
des:
Roast Me Pro is a Pro version of Roast me with more amusing and hilarious comebacks that will make you laugh and sometimes shut you up as well. Alexa will try to fire you up and all you need to do is have control on your veins and don't get roasted by Alexa. With a flavour of both entertainment and laugh, it is a skill which helps you to control yourself whenever someone tries to roast you in personal.

Disclaimer: This is an entertainment skill and we are never intended to insult any individual. Please take this as a good humour. 

Image Credit: IconFinder
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
